name: WatchOS GameApp
body:
### Deployment targets

iOS = **9.3**

WatchOS = **4.0**

### Adding new target

By clicking on Xcode tab _Editor -> Add Target -> watchOS -> Game App_

![](https://git.playflock.com/storage/user/12/files/0b93d554-b533-11e8-81e7-1f06ec5c2612)

![](https://git.playflock.com/storage/user/12/files/b05e2e40-b533-11e8-836c-ef0a2111495a)

### Architectures settings

> Build settings section

Setup _Architectures_ for targets **Watch** and **Watch Extension** as show below

![](https://git.playflock.com/storage/user/12/files/dec1f83e-b5b0-11e8-8d03-20a0661eea7f))

### Version Number
> General section

Check that **Version** and **Build** number equal versions of  project **Unity-iPhone**

![](https://git.playflock.com/storage/user/12/files/e2b23bd8-b525-11e8-9d19-e4c3a6a328bf)

### Paste WatchOS GameApp sources

Paste sources to watch targets from [archive](https://git.playflock.com/MobileDev/WatchOSGameApp/files/2/WatchPack.zip)

### Adding Bitcode support to Unity-iPhone target

![](https://git.playflock.com/storage/user/12/files/4ada1db8-b5b5-11e8-86d7-a2397df420a6)

### Unity Reassembly
To avoid repeat all steps try build Unity iOS project in **Append Mode**

![](https://git.playflock.com/storage/user/12/files/0d7e8a5e-b52d-11e8-8679-6a6fca1c2ff2)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
